videoSnippet.title: Bill Gates vs Magnus Carlsen CHESS GAME
videoSnippet.description:
Watch entire footage here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KFi48q7X3ac

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Thumbnail and player photos by Lennart Ootes https://twitter.com/LennartOotes

Bill Gates vs Magnus Carlsen
2014
KP, Nimzovich defence (B00)

1. e4 Nc6 2. Nf3 d5 3. Bd3 Nf6 4. exd5 Qxd5 5. Nc3 Qh5 6. O-O Bg4 7. h3 Ne5 8. hxg4 Nfxg4 9. Nxe5 Qh2

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Ne2 was best.
